mapper.sql: select SYS_ID, SYS_CODE, SYS_NAME, SYS_DES, AREA_ID, SYSTEM_LAYER, DEVELOPER, ONLINE_DATE, OFFLINE_DATE, TECH_DEPT, MANAGER_ID, APP_COOR_USERS, BUSI_DEPT, BUSI_LEADER, OPR_LEADER, DISA_LEVEL, DISA_MODE, DISA_REC_RTO_TIME, DISA_REC_RPO_TIME, DISA_SYSTEM_NOTE, SEC_LEVEL, CONT_PLAN, MONITOR, SERVICE_TIME, SYS_USER, SERVICE_AREA, FACE_TO_CUST, TIME_OUT, SYS_TYPE, ACCESS_MODE, COMP_BROWSER, HIGH_AVAILABLE_TECH, LOAD_BALANCE, OPR_SYSTEM, SYS_DATABASE, MIDDLEWARE, INNER_JK_PASS, SYS_STATUS, SYS_CREATE_TIME, SYS_CREATE_USER, SYS_UPDATE_TIME, SYS_UPDATE_USER, SYS_PV_ID, SYS_SC_ID, AUTH_TYPE, CONNECT_TO_ESB, CHANNEL_CODE, COMMUNICATION_PROTOCOL, MESSAGE_FORMAT, SYS_PARTITION, INTEGRATION_MODE from opr_system
mapper.select:
SELECT "os".SYS_ID, "os".SYS_CODE, "os".SYS_NAME, "os".SYS_DES, "os".AREA_ID, "os".SYSTEM_LAYER, "os".DEVELOPER, "os".ONLINE_DATE, "os".OFFLINE_DATE, "os".TECH_DEPT, "os".MANAGER_ID, "os".APP_COOR_USERS, "os".BUSI_DEPT, "os".BUSI_LEADER, "os".OPR_LEADER, "os".DISA_LEVEL, "os".DISA_MODE, "os".DISA_REC_RTO_TIME, "os".DISA_REC_RPO_TIME, "os".DISA_SYSTEM_NOTE, "os".SEC_LEVEL, "os".CONT_PLAN, "os".MONITOR, "os".SERVICE_TIME, "os".SYS_USER, "os".SERVICE_AREA, "os".FACE_TO_CUST, "os".TIME_OUT, "os".SYS_TYPE, "os".ACCESS_MODE, "os".COMP_BROWSER, "os".HIGH_AVAILABLE_TECH, "os".LOAD_BALANCE, "os".OPR_SYSTEM, "os".SYS_DATABASE, "os".MIDDLEWARE, "os".INNER_JK_PASS, "os".SYS_STATUS, "os".SYS_CREATE_TIME, "os".SYS_CREATE_USER, "os".SYS_UPDATE_TIME, "os".SYS_UPDATE_USER, "os".SYS_PV_ID, "os".SYS_SC_ID, "os".AUTH_TYPE, "os".CONNECT_TO_ESB, "os".CHANNEL_CODE, "os".COMMUNICATION_PROTOCOL, "os".MESSAGE_FORMAT, "os".SYS_PARTITION, "os".INTEGRATION_MODE, "u".NICK_NAME FROM opr_system "os" LEFT JOIN SYS_USER "u" ON "os".MANAGER_ID = "u".USER_ID
and "os".SYS_NAME like concat(concat('%', #{sysName}), '%') and "os".SYSTEM_LAYER = #{systemLayer} and "os".TECH_DEPT = #{techDept} and "os".MANAGER_ID = #{managerId} and "os".SYS_STATUS = #{sysStatus} and "os".CONNECT_TO_ESB = #{connectToEsb}
mapper.insert:
insert into opr_system
SYS_ID, SYS_CODE, SYS_NAME, SYS_DES, AREA_ID, SYSTEM_LAYER, DEVELOPER, ONLINE_DATE, OFFLINE_DATE, TECH_DEPT, MANAGER_ID, APP_COOR_USERS, BUSI_DEPT, BUSI_LEADER, OPR_LEADER, DISA_LEVEL, DISA_MODE, DISA_REC_RTO_TIME, DISA_REC_RPO_TIME, DISA_SYSTEM_NOTE, SEC_LEVEL, CONT_PLAN, MONITOR, SERVICE_TIME, SYS_USER, SERVICE_AREA, FACE_TO_CUST, TIME_OUT, SYS_TYPE, ACCESS_MODE, COMP_BROWSER, HIGH_AVAILABLE_TECH, LOAD_BALANCE, OPR_SYSTEM, SYS_DATABASE, MIDDLEWARE, INNER_JK_PASS, SYS_STATUS, SYS_CREATE_TIME, SYS_CREATE_USER, SYS_UPDATE_TIME, SYS_UPDATE_USER, SYS_PV_ID, SYS_SC_ID, AUTH_TYPE, CONNECT_TO_ESB, CHANNEL_CODE, COMMUNICATION_PROTOCOL, MESSAGE_FORMAT, SYS_PARTITION, INTEGRATION_MODE,
#{sysId}, #{sysCode}, #{sysName}, #{sysDes}, #{areaId}, #{systemLayer}, #{developer}, #{onlineDate}, #{offlineDate}, #{techDept}, #{managerId}, #{appCoorUsers}, #{busiDept}, #{busiLeader}, #{oprLeader}, #{disaLevel}, #{disaMode}, #{disaRecRtoTime}, #{disaRecRpoTime}, #{disaSystemNote}, #{secLevel}, #{contPlan}, #{monitor}, #{serviceTime}, #{sysUser}, #{serviceArea}, #{faceToCust}, #{timeOut}, #{sysType}, #{accessMode}, #{compBrowser}, #{highAvailableTech}, #{loadBalance}, #{oprSystem}, #{sysDatabase}, #{middleware}, #{innerJkPass}, #{sysStatus}, #{sysCreateTime}, #{sysCreateUser}, #{sysUpdateTime}, #{sysUpdateUser}, #{sysPvId}, #{sysScId}, #{authType}, #{connectToEsb}, #{channelCode}, #{communicationProtocol}, #{messageFormat}, #{sysPartition}, #{integrationMode},
mapper.delete:
delete from opr_system where SYS_ID in
#{sysId}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(SYS_ID) as sysNum FROM opr_system
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT SV_SCN_ID) as sceneNum FROM opr_scenario_version
SELECT count(MAPPING_ID) as consumeNum FROM aesb_g_service_scene_mapping

select.if: SELECT NVL( m."dealYear", 0 ) AS "dealYear", NVL( m."dealNum", 0 ) AS "dealNum", NVL( m."doneYear", m."dealYear" ) AS "doneYear", NVL( m."doneNum", 0 ) AS "doneNum", NVL( m."faceYear", m."dealYear" ) AS "faceYear", NVL( m."faceNum", 0 ) AS "faceNum" FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT extract( year FROM LAST_MOD_TIME ) AS "dealYear", count( JK_VERSION_ID ) AS "dealNum" FROM aesb_g_sys_interface_info WHERE DELIVER_STATE = '0' GROUP BY extract( year FROM LAST_MOD_TIME ) ORDER BY extract( year FROM LAST_MOD_TIME ) ASC ) t LEFT JOIN ( SELECT extract( year FROM LAST_MOD_TIME ) AS "doneYear", count( JK_VERSION_ID ) AS "doneNum" FROM aesb_g_sys_interface_info WHERE DELIVER_STATE = '1' GROUP BY extract( year FROM LAST_MOD_TIME ) ORDER BY extract( year FROM LAST_MOD_TIME ) ASC ) s ON t."dealYear" = s."doneYear" LEFT JOIN ( SELECT extract( year FROM LAST_MOD_TIME ) AS "faceYear", count( JK_VERSION_ID ) AS "faceNum" FROM aesb_g_sys_interface_info GROUP BY extract( year FROM LAST_MOD_TIME ) ORDER BY extract( year FROM LAST_MOD_TIME ) ASC ) f ON t."dealYear" = f."faceYear" ) m

SELECT NVL( m."dealQuarter", 0 ) AS "dealQuarter", NVL( m."dealNum", 0 ) AS "dealNum", NVL( m."doneQuarter", m."dealQuarter" ) AS "doneQuarter", NVL( m."doneNum", 0 ) AS "doneNum", NVL( m."faceQuarter", m."dealQuarter" ) AS "faceQuarter", NVL( m."faceNum", 0 ) AS "faceNum" FROM( SELECT * FROM( SELECT TO_CHAR( LAST_MOD_TIME, 'Q' ) AS "dealQuarter",count( JK_VERSION_ID ) AS "dealNum" FROM aesb_g_sys_interface_info WHERE DELIVER_STATE = '0' GROUP BY TO_CHAR( LAST_MOD_TIME, 'Q' ) ORDER BY TO_CHAR( LAST_MOD_TIME, 'Q' ) ASC) t LEFT JOIN ( SELECT TO_CHAR( LAST_MOD_TIME, 'Q' ) AS "doneQuarter", count( JK_VERSION_ID ) AS "doneNum" FROM aesb_g_sys_interface_info WHERE DELIVER_STATE = '1' GROUP BY TO_CHAR( LAST_MOD_TIME, 'Q' ) ORDER BY TO_CHAR( LAST_MOD_TIME, 'Q' ) ASC ) s ON t."dealQuarter" = s."doneQuarter" LEFT JOIN ( SELECT TO_CHAR( LAST_MOD_TIME, 'Q' ) AS "faceQuarter", count( JK_VERSION_ID ) AS "faceNum" FROM aesb_g_sys_interface_info GROUP BY TO_CHAR( LAST_MOD_TIME, 'Q' ) ORDER BY TO_CHAR( LAST_MOD_TIME, 'Q' ) ASC ) f ON t."dealQuarter" = f."faceQuarter" ) m

SELECT NVL( m."dealMonth", 0 ) AS "dealMonth", NVL( m."dealNum", 0 ) AS "dealNum", NVL( m."doneMonth", m."dealMonth" ) AS "doneMonth", NVL( m."doneNum", 0 ) AS "doneNum", NVL( m."faceMonth", m."dealMonth" ) AS "faceMonth", NVL( m."faceNum", 0 ) AS "faceNum" FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT extract( month FROM LAST_MOD_TIME ) AS "dealMonth", count( JK_VERSION_ID ) AS "dealNum" FROM aesb_g_sys_interface_info WHERE DELIVER_STATE = '0' GROUP BY extract( month FROM LAST_MOD_TIME ) ORDER BY extract( month FROM LAST_MOD_TIME ) ASC ) t LEFT JOIN ( SELECT extract( month FROM LAST_MOD_TIME ) AS "doneMonth", count( JK_VERSION_ID ) AS "doneNum" FROM aesb_g_sys_interface_info WHERE DELIVER_STATE = '1' GROUP BY extract( month FROM LAST_MOD_TIME ) ORDER BY extract( month FROM LAST_MOD_TIME ) ASC ) s ON t."dealMonth" = s."doneMonth" LEFT JOIN ( SELECT extract( month FROM LAST_MOD_TIME ) AS "faceMonth", count( JK_VERSION_ID ) AS "faceNum" FROM aesb_g_sys_interface_info GROUP BY extract( month FROM LAST_MOD_TIME ) ORDER BY extract( month FROM LAST_MOD_TIME ) ASC ) f ON t."dealMonth" = f."faceMonth" ) m

mapper.select: SELECT * FROM( SELECT "m".MAPPING_VERSION_ID AS "svId", "m".PRO_SYS_ID AS "sysId", "m".SERVICE_ID AS "serviceId", "s".SYS_NAME AS "sysName", "v".SV_NAME AS "svName", count( "m".MAPPING_VERSION_ID ) AS "consumeTimes" FROM aesb_g_service_scene_mapping "m" INNER JOIN opr_scenario_version "v" ON "m".MAPPING_VERSION_ID = "v".SV_ID INNER JOIN opr_system "s" ON "m".PRO_SYS_ID = "s".SYS_ID WHERE "m".MAPPING_TYPE = 1 GROUP BY "m".MAPPING_VERSION_ID,"s".SYS_NAME,"m".PRO_SYS_ID,"v".SV_NAME,"m".SERVICE_ID ORDER BY count( "m".MAPPING_VERSION_ID ) DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 10
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT PRO_SYS_ID AS "sysId",COUNT( PRO_SYS_ID ) AS "sysNum" FROM AESB_G_SERVICE_SCENE_MAPPING GROUP BY PRO_SYS_ID ORDER BY COUNT( PRO_SYS_ID ) DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <=10
select SYS_NAME from opr_system where SYS_ID = #{sysId}
select SYS_ID from opr_system where SYS_NAME = #{sysName}
SELECT "a".SYS_NAME AS "sysName", "a".SYS_CODE AS "sysCode", "u".USER_NAME AS "principal" FROM OPR_SYSTEM "a" INNER JOIN SYS_USER "u" ON "a".MANAGER_ID = "u".USER_ID WHERE "a".SYS_ID = #{sysId}
SELECT DISTINCT "os".MANAGER_ID AS "value", "u".NICK_NAME AS "label" FROM OPR_SYSTEM "os" LEFT JOIN SYS_USER "u" ON "os".MANAGER_ID = "u".USER_ID
SELECT DISTINCT SYSTEM_LAYER AS "value" FROM OPR_SYSTEM
